name: Loops
headline: Email sending for startups
description: Loops is a simple and beautiful email sending platform for SaaS companies. We have a Notion-style block editor for email creation, excellent deliverability for transactional mail and pre-built loops for SaaS companies to snap-in to increase their revenue and user engagement.

founders.name: Chris Frantz, Founder
founders.description: Building Loops (loops.so). Prev sold Snazzy AI to Unbounce, led growth at Biteable and strategy at Curiosity.

founders.name: Adam Kaczmarek, Founder
founders.description: Adam Kaczmarek spent 10 years as a systems engineer in aerospace and defense before entering the software world. He's passionate about crafting delightful experiences for users and solving challenging technical problems.

We want to make email easy.
Email shouldn’t be complex.It shouldn’t live in your codebase and it should fit with your brand. Your designers should love it. Your engineers should find the APIs easy. Your marketers should feel empowered to send good and relevant email. 
And if all of those people are just you, it should work well for you as well. 
[Give it a try](https://loops.so/<https:/app.loops.so/register>), and let us know what you think.

generated_description:
**Loops: The Email Platform for Startups**

**Overview**
Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator Batch W22, Loops is based in Washington, DC. This startup is on a mission to revolutionize email sending specifically tailored for SaaS companies. With a lean team of just five, Loops aims to simplify the complexities of email communications for modern software businesses.

**Core Offering**
At its core, Loops provides a user-friendly email sending platform equipped with a Notion-style block editor. This feature enables SaaS companies to create visually appealing emails with ease. Loops boasts exceptional deliverability rates for transactional emails, making sure that your messages reach their destination without getting lost in spam folders. Additionally, it offers pre-built components or "loops" which can be easily integrated to boost user engagement and revenue.

**Features**
- **Email Creation:** Craft emails effortlessly using the intuitive block editor.
- **Great Deliverability:** Enjoy reliable delivery for transactional emails.
- **Pre-built Loops:** Utilize customizable loops that enhance revenue and user interaction.
- **Seamless Integrations:** Connects with numerous platforms via easy-to-use APIs.

**Target Audience**
Loops primarily caters to startups and SaaS companies looking for a streamlined email solution. Whether it’s sending product updates, marketing newsletters, or transactional messages, Loops positions itself as the go-to platform for all email-related tasks.

**Tools and Resources**
They offer extensive documentation and guides to help users get started swiftly. You can find everything you need to know about their features and pricing on their website [Loops](https://loops.so).

**Backed by Y Combinator**
With Michael Seibel as their group partner, Loops is supported by one of the most prestigious startup accelerators, adding credibility to their innovative service.

**In Conclusion**
Loops is built for simplicity and efficiency, tailored for startups that desire an elegant email solution without the hassle. If you're looking to take your email strategy to the next level, Loops might just be the tool you’ve been waiting for. Give it a spin and experience the difference!
